naslov: SAMOSTOJEĆA KUĆA S POGLEDOM NA MORE I GRAD - ŽRNOVNICA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Žrnovnica, Split - okolica, Splitsko Dalmatinska, Hrvatska, €500.000,00 __ Samostojeća kuća koja se sastoji od prizemlja i prvog kata. Ukupna površina kuće je 200 M2 i dvorišta 600 M2, kuća je održavana, te ju je potrebno adaptirati. Sastoji se od jedne stambene jedinice, prizemlje se sastoji od dvije garaže i veliki otvoreni prostor jugozapadne orijentacije. Prizemlje nije uređeno, te ga je moguće pretvoriti u stan s balkonom i terasom. Na prvom katu se nalaze tri sobe, dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom i kuhinjom, balkonom, wc-om, kupaonicom te hodnikom. Stubište vodi na drugi kat te nudi mogućnost boljeg iskorištavanja trenutnog prostora i postavljanja krova. Kuća se nalazi na mirnom uzvišenom terenu s kojeg se pruža otvoren pogled na grad Split i more. _ Žrnovnica, Split Dalmatia, Croatia, €500.000,00 __ Detached house consisting of a ground floor and first floor. The total area of ​​the house is 200 M2 and the yard is 600 M2, the house is maintained, and it needs to be renovated. It consists of one residential unit, the ground floor consists of two garages and a large open space with a southwest orientation. The ground floor is not furnished, and it is possible to convert it into an apartment with a balcony and a terrace. On the first floor there are three bedrooms, a living room with a dining room and kitchen, a balcony, a toilet, a bathroom and a hallway. The staircase leads to the second floor and offers the possibility of better use of the current space and installing a roof. The house is located on a quiet elevated terrain with an open view of the city of Split and the sea. _ [Posrednička naknada za kupca iznosi 2% + PDV / Brokerage fee is 2% + VAT] Contact: IVAN ANĐELIĆ Licensed Real Estate Advisor Phone: +385-95-909-0504
